titleInfo.title: Historia filicum :an exposition of the nature, number and organography of ferns, and review of the principles upon which genera are founded, and the systems of classification of the principal authors, with a new general arrangement; characters of the genera; remarks on their relationship to one another; their species; reference to authors; geographical distribution; etc., etc. /With 30 lithographic plates by W. H. Fitch, illustrating the characters of the tribes.
